citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 5:00p on
30-Aug-18.
ACI Bartels arrived at the facility and met with the licensee. The licensee only had a short time before a meeting
and needed to do chores.
